name: Paneer Butter Masala
shortDescription: Rich and creamy curry made with paneer.
longDescription: Paneer Butter Masala is a classic North Indian dish made with succulent paneer cubes in a rich, creamy tomato-based gravy, spiced with aromatic spices and garnished with butter. It is typically served with naan, roti, or rice.
keyFeatures: Rich and creamy, Vegetarian, Aromatic spices, Butter garnish

reviews.review: One of the best paneer butter masala I've ever had!

name: Pav Bhaji
shortDescription: A spicy blend of vegetables served with buttery pav bread.
longDescription: Pav Bhaji is a famous street food of Mumbai, consisting of a spicy vegetable mash cooked with Indian spices, served with buttery toasted pav bread. It's a flavorful and filling snack that can be enjoyed any time of the day.

reviews.review: Great taste but a little too spicy for me.

name: Pani Puri
shortDescription: Crispy puris filled with tangy and spicy flavored water.
longDescription: Pani Puri is a beloved Indian street food consisting of crispy puris filled with spiced potato, chickpeas, and tangy flavored water. It's served as a fun and interactive snack, perfect for a quick bite.

reviews.review: A bit messy but absolutely tasty!
So crispy and tangy! A perfect treat.

name: Thepla
shortDescription: Traditional Gujarati flatbread with spices and fenugreek.
longDescription: Thepla is a spiced flatbread from Gujarat made with whole wheat flour, fresh fenugreek leaves, and a mix of flavorful spices, perfect for a quick snack or travel food. It is often enjoyed with yogurt or pickle.

reviews.review: Great taste but could use a little more spice.
Perfect for a quick and healthy meal.

name: Tomato Soup
shortDescription: Smooth and creamy soup made with fresh tomatoes.
longDescription: Tomato Soup is a comforting and delicious soup made with fresh, ripe tomatoes blended into a creamy consistency, seasoned with herbs and served hot. It's a perfect starter or light meal.

reviews.review: A great starter, but could be a bit more flavorful.

name: Pizza
shortDescription: Cheesy pizza topped with fresh vegetables.
longDescription: Pizza is a popular dish made with a dough base, smothered in tangy tomato sauce, layered with melted cheese, and topped with fresh, crunchy vegetables. It's a classic favorite for any meal.

reviews.review: A bit too cheesy for my taste, but still delicious.

name: Chole Kulche
shortDescription: Spicy chickpea curry with fluffy kulchas.
longDescription: Chole Kulche is a North Indian delicacy made with a spicy chickpea curry served alongside soft, fluffy kulcha bread. It's often eaten as a street food breakfast or lunch.

reviews.review: Nice, but could have more punch in the spice.

name: Dosa
shortDescription: Thin and crispy South Indian crepe.
longDescription: Dosa is a traditional South Indian dish made from fermented rice and lentil batter, served with coconut chutney and sambar for a wholesome meal. It's a great option for breakfast or dinner.

reviews.review: The perfect dosa, crispy and flavorful.
Love it with chutney and sambar!

name: Biryani
shortDescription: Fragrant rice dish with spices and vegetables.
longDescription: Biryani is a flavorful rice dish cooked with aromatic spices, layered with vegetables or meat, and served with raita or gravy on the side. It's a complete meal that's both filling and flavorful.

reviews.review: Aromatic and delicious! A true delight.
Great taste, but could use more veggies.
